flawed_nl_solution:
A quarter is worth five nickels because 0.25 / 0.05 = <<0.25/0.05=5>>5
She gets 1000 nickels from the bank because 20 x 5 = <<20*5=1000>>1000
200 of the nickels are iron nickels because 1000 x 0.2 = <<1000*0.2=200>>200
800 of the nickels are regular because 1000 - 200 = <<1000-200=800>>800
The iron nickels are worth $600 because 200 x 3 = <<200*3=600>>600
The regular nickels are worth $40 because 800 x 0.05 = <<800*0.05=40>>40
Her money is now worth $640 because 600 + 40 = <<600+40=640>>640
#### 640

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 100, not 1000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
